data.message: I've been a fan from the beginning.  However, the insults, hatred and shade have done you in. I'm out. You really are a unique talent. America made that possible for you. You should be proud. But, ure just another hater.

replies.message: bye bye
No one cares
His entire career has been insults, hatred, and shade. It didn't bother you before?

Eminem’s always fished out insults as if they were napkins so why are you salty now?support trump maybe?
He lived in a trailer park,used to get bullied so much he’d have to move schools constantly and once got put in a coma,had dealt with serious mental illnesses all whilst living in America.Up until he became mainstream,America did fuck all for him.
But still Em loves his country and will say what he feel has to be said in order to make things right,like dissing the president who is a racist among many other things.
I’m not sure he’s the hater.
Bye Loriciaaaaaa
Azad Aj, if no one cares, then why did you comment?
Hey, guess what? I get to have an opinion and voice my opinion. That's what ure all doing... lol

I dont remember people being such fucking cry babies when he insulted Bush. But when it comes to their lortttt and saviour donald Chump they all butt hurts

then bye. why you still here? why you commenting? just fuckin leave
